name: Richard "Red" Amick
introduction: Richard Wayne "Red" Amick (January 19 1929, Kansas City, Missouri - May 16 1995, Crystal River, Florida) was a United States driver. He drove in the Indianapolis 500 twice, retiring in 1959 and finishing 11th in 1960. After an accident later in 1960, he was out of racing for two years, but returned to Indianapolis in 1963. After failing to qualify, he retired for good.
